short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In a single screen view record and manage your day to day notes, web URL(s), credentials

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage all your notes, URL(s) and credentials in a single view with Chrome extension. No need to worry about saving and keeping a backup, chrome does it for you.

Easy to search and multiple project option for different work schedules.
